aors.data
Class DataBus

java.lang.Object
  aors.data.DataBus
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataBusInterface, ControllerEventListener, CollectionEventListener, CollectionInitEventListener, ObjektDestroyEventListener, ObjektInitEventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class DataBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataBusInterface

The DataBus implements a generic data transfer channel used by all components. It replaces the old logger instance used everywhere and the static LoggerFactory implemented by jw. The DataBus encapsulates the logger and enables the user to replace the Logger during runtime without propagating the new logger manually.

Since:
04/August/2009

initLogger

public void initLogger(int loggerType)
Initializes the logger used in the DataBus instance. This function is not available in the DataBusInterface, only in DataBus itself.

Parameters:
loggerType - the type of the Logger

enableDataStatCollector

public void enableDataStatCollector()
Enable the DataStatCollector module. This is used to record the development of agent properties over time.

disableDataStatCollector

public void disableDataStatCollector()
Disable the DataStatCollector and remove it as listener.

addEvent

public void addEvent(EnvironmentEvent envEvent)
This method will add an external created events to the databus collector. These are used by the environment simulator. For performance reasons this method has to be used only if is really necessary. Instead, use addEvents(List envEvents) when possible.

Parameters:
events - the list with events

addEvents

public void addEvents(java.util.List<EnvironmentEvent> envEvents)
This method will add a List of external created events to the databus collector. These are used by the environment simulator. FOr performance reasons this method is preferred in place of addEvent(EnvironmentEvent).

Parameters:
events - the list with events

getEvtEvents

public java.util.List<EnvironmentEvent> getEvtEvents()
External modules provides Environment Events that are collected by the data bus. This method is getting all collected events until the moment of the call of this method. Please note that is called in the middle of a step, then not all possible events may be here while some of them may be created later in the current step.

Returns:
external created Environment Events list

clearEvtEvents

public void clearEvtEvents()
Clear the events collected by the databus collector. This is done so on the next step these events are "forgotten".

getStatistics

public java.lang.String getStatistics(long step)
If DataStatCollector enabled, this method returns statistics of the given step in JSON format as a string.

Parameters:
step -
Returns:
statistics in JSON format
